title: Host an Agent-Only Open House
description: For a new high-end listing, an agent hosts a catered open house specifically for other real estate agents to preview the property.

tasks.description: Create an invitation and email it to a list of top-producing agents in the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: An email invitation is sent to a targeted list of agents.

tasks.description: Arrange for catering and prepare marketing materials (flyers, feature sheets) for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Catering is booked and marketing materials are printed.

tasks.description: During the event, network with attending agents to promote the property and gather feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively markets the property to their peers.
